穅字的基本解释

穅
kāng
同“糠”。

穅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kāng］
［《廣韻》苦岡切，平唐，溪。］
亦作“穅1”。
(1)稻、麦、谷子等子实上脱下的皮或壳。
(2)质地空疏而不坚实。

穅字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　穅； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页859第02
〔古文〕?【唐韻】苦岡切【集韻】丘岡切【正韻】丘剛切，?音康。【說文】穀皮也。从禾从米，庚聲。【前漢·貢禹傳】妻子穅豆不贍。【莊子·天運篇】播穅眯目，則天地四方易位矣。　又【諡法】好樂怠政曰穅。【前漢·諸侯王表】有中山穅王。　又樂器名。【禮·樂記】治亂以相。【註】相卽拊也，亦以節樂。拊以韋爲表，裝之以穅。槺一名相，因以名焉。　或省作康。【爾雅·釋器】康謂之蠱。【註】康，米皮。　【集韻】或作粇，亦作糠。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kāng］
["Guangyun" Kugang cut, Pingtang, Xi. ]
Also known as "Bran 1".
(1) The peeled skin or husk of rice, wheat, millet and other seeds.
(2) The texture is empty and not firm.
bran
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [He Zi Department] 　 Zhan; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 859 02
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Kugang cut [Ji Yun] Qiu Gang cut [Zheng Yun] Qiu Gang cut,? Yinkang. [Said the text] Gu Pi also. Cong He Cong Mi, Geng Sheng. [Previous Han·Gong Yu Biography] His wife does not support the bran beans. [Zhuangzi·Tianyun Chapter] Sowing chaff and squinting the eyes, the world will be transposed in all directions.　[Posthumous Law] Happy and negligent politics called chaff. 【Former Han Dynasty·Princes and Kings】There is the King of Zanshan.　Also the name of an instrument. 【Li·Le Ji】Carry chaos to phase out. [Note] The phase is also stretched out, also with festival music. We use Wei as a table, and pretend to be chaff. Li is a prime minister because of his fame.　Or province for health. 【Erya·Release Device】Kang is called Gu. [Note] Kang, Mi Pi.　【Jiyun】It is also used as rice or chaff.
